hero.subtitle: Kuri Robert Construction, duhuza ubuhanga, ibikoresho bya modereni n'ubuhanga kugirango dushyiremo imishinga yizewe, ikora kandi ikomeza.

hero.description: Robert Construction ni sosiyete yizewe y'ubwubatsi n'ubuhanga ikorerwa na Eng. Robert, umunyabwubatsi ufite ubuhanga n'ubuhanga bukomeye burambye bukora imishinga yihariye, ikomeza kandi ifite ubwiza bwihariye.

mission.title: Intego yacu
mission.description1: Turacyaza imyumvire ubwubatsi n'ibisubizo by'ubuhanga kuva mu bitekerezo kugeza ku bikorwa mu bwubatsi bw'amarimbi, ubucuruzi n'ubukungu.
mission.description2: Kuva mu bitekerezo kugeza ku bikorwa, itsinda ryacu rikora neza, rikora ibyiza kandi rikora vuba muri proje yose dufatanyije. Intego yacu irashyizweho ubutabera, umutekano n'ubuhanga.

values.title: Indangagaciro zacu
values.subtitle: Izi ntangiriro zacu zikurikizwa muri buri cyanzwe dushyira mu bikorwa no muri buri proje duha

safety.title: Umutekano Mbere
safety.description: Turaha umutekano w'abakozi, abakiriya n'abaturage icyubahiro muri proje zose, dukoresha amabwiriza y'umutekano akomeye.

excellence.title: Ubuhanga
excellence.description: Turaha ubwiza bwihariye dushishikariza ibintu byose, dusanga ibisubizo bishya kandi duhindura imikorere yacu buri gihe.

integrity.title: Ubutabera
integrity.description: Dushyiraho ubufatanye burambye dukoresheje ubwumvane bw'ukuri, imikorere itaziguye n'icyizere cyacu mu bihembo byacu.

innovation.title: Imyumvire Mishya
innovation.description: Turakoresha ikoranabuhanga ryawe n'uburyo bw'ubwubatsi bw'iki gihe kugirango duhe ibisubizo byihuse, bikomeza kandi bishobora gukomeza mu gihe kizaza.

services.title: Serivisi zacu
services.subtitle: Turakora kandi dushyiraho inzu zikomeye, zikora neza kandi zirabika neza muri buri gace

management.title: Gucunga Umushinga
management.description: Turacyaza imyumvire kuva mu bitekerezo kugeza ku bikorwa, dushyiraho umushinga utaziguye ufite ubwumvane bw'ukuri n'igihe cyose.

team.title: Tubane n'Abayobozi
team.subtitle: Abakozi bafite ubuhanga bakurikirana sosiyete yacu ku nzego

members.name: Eng. Robert
members.bio: Civil engineer with 30+ years of experience in construction management and project development.

footer.tagline: Kubaka ubuziranenge binyuze mu guhanga udushya, ubunyangamugayo n’ubuhanga mu mwuga. Umufatanyabikorwa wawe wizewe mu bisubizo byose by'ubwubatsi n'ubuhanga mu Rwanda.

certifications.rema: Yujuje ibisabwa n’Amabwiriza y’Ibidukikije ya REMA

contact.hoursDetail:
Kuwa Mbere - Kuwa Gatanu: 8:00 - 18:00
Kuwa Gatandatu: 9:00 - 16:00
Ku Cyumweru: Gifunze

newsletter.title: Guma Umenye Amakuru
newsletter.description: Akira inama nshya z'ubwubatsi, amakuru y’imishinga n'ay’urwego rw’ubwubatsi byoherezwa muri imeyili yawe.
